items.title: After synchronizing plugins for the first time, plugin finder is not closed
items.body:
### Description

When finalizing the plugins synchronization for the first time, I have the following view: 
![image](https://github.com/DropSnorz/OwlPlug/assets/98417121/9e56fe71-27fd-4d5a-ac5d-df05f19803eb)

There's no possibility to close the plugin finder window, so I'll never be able to use the rest of the application.

If the user closes the app and starts it again, the list of plugins will be displayed and no plugins finder window will be prompted: 
![image](https://github.com/DropSnorz/OwlPlug/assets/98417121/49014764-2580-445a-a02f-4a73763ea934)

---

### Steps to reproduce
| Step No.   |      Description      |  Used Data | Actual Result |
|:----------|:-------------:|:------:|------:|
| 1 |  Open the app | - | The "plugin finder assistant" is displayed|
| 2 |    Click on "Next" button   | - | A synchronization of all your plugins is done. The list of plugins appears in the main window behind the plugin finder. A message appears in the small window below suggesting the syncrhronization was completed. |
| 3 | Try to close the plugins finder window. | - | User is not able to close this window. |

---

### Where was reproduced
```
----------
Windows 10 Pro 21H2
OwlPlug 1.23.0
----------
```
